alert.note: Alert for Garland (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 30 at 5:41PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Garland County through 615 PM CDT... At 540 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hot Springs Memorial Field, or near Hot Springs, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hot Springs... Hot Springs Memorial Field... Hot Springs National Park... Rockwell... Oaklawn Racetrack... Gulpha Gorge... Red Oak... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
